## MatrixBuilder.fill() method

Constructs a matrix of the specified dimension, whose entries are all the specified value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fill(value: S, shape: MatrixShape): M;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>S</code> | The value that should be used for every entry in the new matrix |
|  shape | <code>MatrixShape</code> | The shape of the matrix as a tuple |

<b>Returns:</b>

`M`

The new matrix

## Example


```
const allTwos = matrixBuilder.fill(2, 3, 4)

// [ 2 2 2 2 ]
// [ 2 2 2 2 ]
// [ 2 2 2 2 ]

```
